title: MM问题
author: SaKTL
txt_content: mythicmob怎么玩家击杀怪物死亡的时候播放一个音效.

replies.author: 嘿嘿嘿嘿嘿鹰
replies.txt_content:
Mythicmobs/Mobs:
  Skills:
  - skill{s=怪物死亡音效} @target ~onDeath
Mythicmobs/Skills:
  Skills:
  - sound{s=mob.endermen.scream}
sound音效大全
https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Sounds.json

replies.author: SaKTL
replies.txt_content:
嘿嘿嘿嘿嘿鹰 发表于 2020-7-19 15:04
Mythicmobs/Mobs:
  Skills:
  - skill{s=怪物死亡音效} @target ~onDeath
额................非常感谢.
可是我眼搓找不到TNT爆炸的音效。。。你能告诉我吗qwq

replies.author: Molean
replies.txt_content:
SaKTL 发表于 2020-7-19 17:25
额................非常感谢.
可是我眼搓找不到TNT爆炸的音效。。。你能告诉我吗qwq ...
每个版本不一样，1.13+是entity.generic.explode
